summary: A set of static items with a gothic theme, including new meshes, textures, and icons [if you choose to make them into a clutter or quest-item]. Has four dragon statue variations, an Orb, a Crystal, a Candle, and an offering bowl. One straight up candle [no dragon on this one], a Chalice, and two stained glass oil lamps.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Gothic Resource Set Remastered[/b][/size]
[size=4][b]===========================[/b][/size]

By Gizmodian

Remastered By: DaggerfallTeam
==============

Description:
============

A set of static items with a gothic theme, including new meshes,
textures, and icons [if you choose to make them into a clutter or
quest-item]. Has four dragon statue variations, an Orb, a Crystal, a
Candle, and an offering bowl. One straight up candle [no dragon on this
one], a Chalice, and two stained glass oil lamps.



Additional Info:
================

You can find them, in the Middle of Riften by the giant well.
Also includes the .esp

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/35466/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Foblivion%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D35466&pUp=1]Original Version for TES Oblivion
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/35466/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Foblivion%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D35466&pUp=1][color=#0000ff]Official Facebook Page, Like and Enjoy[/color][/url][color=#0000ff]
[/color]
Programs Used:
==============

3DSmax9
Adobe Photoshop CS3
Nifskope


Credits:
========

Bethesda


Usage and Permissions:
======================

This is an open-source resource, you cannot claim it as your own. You may
use any part of the meshes or textures, however, you must credit me.
author: Gizmodian
